weekly_top_story.headline: US and China Reach Landmark One-Year Trade Pact
weekly_top_story.summary: The US and China have agreed on a significant one-year trade deal that stops a threatened 100% tariff on Chinese goods, resumes agricultural purchases, and aims to stabilize fraught economic relations with broad global trade implications.

stories.headline: Explosion Inside Harvard Medical School Building Deemed Intentional
stories.summary: An intentional explosion occurred inside a building at Harvard Medical School, prompting an active investigation and search for suspects, raising concerns for safety in academic institutions.

stories.headline: British Police Arrest Two After Stabbing Attack on Train Near Cambridge
stories.summary: At least ten people were wounded in a stabbing attack on a train near Cambridge, UK; authorities have arrested two suspects, underscoring ongoing security challenges in public transportation.

stories.headline: President Trump Threatens Military Action Against Nigeria Over Christian Persecution
stories.summary: President Trump has escalated tensions by threatening to cut US aid and prepare possible military action against Nigeria, citing ongoing persecution of Christians, which could affect US-African diplomatic relations.
